THE PERFECT COMMITMENT TO WELLNESS

Membership that pays! $14.99 a month gives you:

One free mimosas manicure per month

Exclusive to members only: Mimosas Pedicure with surprising price at $35.00

Free birthday pedicure (valid after 6th month)

Only members are able to schedule no wait appointments on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays

Members save 5% on all additional services

- Additional Benefits -

Members enjoy 10% off all retail product

You can roll your free mimosas member’s manicure over to next month

Gift unused manicure to your choice of women’s charities in Charlotte

M&N Partnership discounts: Hair Salon, Pet Groomer, Esthetician, Tanning Salon, Gyms, Yoga (coming soon)

You will earn 50 points when you refer friends or family who sign up for a mimosas membership

referrals - to show our appreciation, when you introduce a new member in the first 30 days of your membership, you'll recieve a free uptown minute manicure. after your first month, you'll be eligible for 50% off a manicure
donated or gifted unused mimosas member manicure must be used within 60 days
